edu.gcu.bootcamp.cst135.milestone.model

Interface iActions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, Checking, Loan, Saving

    public interface iActions

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEPOSIT
      DEPOSIT and WITHDRAW are provided as descriptors for transType in processTransaction and can be used as multipliers depending on the transaction type
      static int WITHDRAWAL 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doTransaction(int transType, double amount)
      interface method for processing a transaction as a deposit (or loan payment) or withdrawal
      double getTransactionValue(java.lang.String message)
      interface method for getting a double value from a Scanner

    • Field Detail

      • DEPOSIT

        static final int DEPOSIT
        DEPOSIT and WITHDRAW are provided as descriptors for transType in processTransaction and can be used as multipliers depending on the transaction type
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WITHDRAWAL

        static final int WITHDRAWAL
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionValue

        double getTransactionValue(java.lang.String message)
        interface method for getting a double value from a Scanner
        Parameters:
        message - is a string prompt for the user
        Returns:
        double value representing the transaction amount

      • doTransaction

        void doTransaction(int transType,
                   double amount)
        interface method for processing a transaction as a deposit (or loan payment) or withdrawal
        Parameters:
        transType - multiplier so doTransaction can process deposits and withdrawals (-1 for withdrawal or +1 for deposit)
        amount - the amount of the attempted transaction
